"MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "${DunkinComboMoments#MomentCode}", "EventType": "${DunkinComboMoments#EventType}", "OfferName": "${DunkinComboMoments#MomentCode}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode == \"PP\" && (PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.ProductCategoryCode2 == \"EGGS\" && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue > 1) && (PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.ProductCategoryCode2 == \"HOTCAKES\" && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue > 1) && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.ItemNumber not in (\"16\",\"17\")", "Status": "P" } } ] }, "ReleaseState": "P" }
